entry.title: 都市計画論文集に採択されました
entry.summary:
都市計画論文集に採択されました．

西 颯人, 浅見 泰司, 地理的制約条件に基づく統計的多次元尺度構成法, 都市計画論文集, 2019, 54 巻, 3 号, p. 826-832

ソースコードをこちらで公開しています

entry.title: Upload the BGMDS code!
entry.summary: I had a presentation about my method for visualization called *Bayesian Geographical Multi-Dimensional Scaling(BGMDS)", and uploaded python source code HERE!
entry.content: I had a presentation about my method for visualization called *Bayesian Geographical Multi-Dimensional Scaling(BGMDS)", and uploaded python source code HERE!
